cachePathFlagDescription: Relative or full file path for where the metadata cache will be stored.
commandDescription: Command to pre-download any required metadata for a specified user or provar connection
connectionNameFlagDescription: Specify the name of connection for which metadata to be downloaded.
connectionoverridesFlagDescription: Specify comma seperated values for connection overrides, eg Admin:test@provar.com,Reg:test1@provar.com
loglevelFlagDescription: Specify the log level for command
metadataLevelFlagDescription: Permitted values reload (get all metadata - default) | refresh (only download changes).
provarCLINotFound: Please download Provar CLI or Studio to run this command.
